title: Grand Duchy of Lithuania
summary: The Grand Duchy of Lithuania was a European state that lasted from the 13th century[5] to 1795,[6] when the territory was partitioned among the Russian Empire, the Kingdom of Prussia, and the Habsburg Empire of Austria. The state was founded by Lithuanians, who were at the time a polytheistic nation born from several united Baltic tribes from Auk≈°taitija.[7][8][9]
